part1.question: What is your favorite hobby and why?
Do you prefer reading books or watching movies?
Do you like to travel? Why or why not?
Can you describe the place where you live?
Do you prefer to spend your free time indoors or outdoors? Why?
Do you enjoy cooking? Why or why not?
Do you prefer reading books or watching movies? Why?
Do you like to visit museums? Why or why not?
Have you ever attended a live music concert? How was the experience?
Do you think people in your country have enough time for leisure activities? Why or why not?
What kind of TV programs do you enjoy watching?
How do you usually celebrate your birthday?
What kind of weather do you like the most?

part2.question:
Describe a special meal you have had.

Where you had the meal,
Who you were with,
What you ate,
Why it was special

Describe a memorable trip you have taken.

Where you went,
Who you went with,
What you did there,
Why it was memorable

Describe a hobby you enjoy.

What the hobby is,
How you started doing it,
Why you enjoy it,
How it benefits you

Describe a person who has influenced you the most.

Who the person is,
How you know this person,
How they have influenced you,
Why this person is important to you

Describe a film you watched recently.

What the film is,
What it is about,
Why you chose to watch it,
How you felt about it

Describe a time when you helped someone.

Who you helped,
How you helped them,
Why they needed help,
How helping them made you feel

Describe a book you recently read.

What the book is about,
Why you chose to read it,
What you learned from it,
How you felt about it

Describe an interesting tradition in your country.

What the tradition is,
How it is celebrated,
Why it is important,
How you feel about it

Describe a piece of technology that you find very useful.

What the technology is,
How you use it,
Why you find it useful,
How it has changed your life

Describe a skill you have learned that you think is very useful.

What the skill is,
How you learned it,
Why you think it is useful,
How it has helped you

Describe a memorable event you attended.

What the event was,
Where and when it took place,
Who you were with,
Why it was memorable

part3.question: How important is travel in personal development?
What impact does technology have on communication?
Do you think people today are more or less interested in arts?
In what ways does tourism impact the local economy and community?
How important is it for children to learn art in school?
How has education changed over recent years?
How do you think globalization has affected cultural traditions in your country?
In what ways can technology help people communicate more effectively?
Why do you think some people prefer living in big cities while others prefer the countryside?
How do you think advertising influences people's decisions?
What are some of the main environmental problems your country is facing today?
Do you believe that working from home is better for employees? Why or why not?
How has the concept of family changed in recent years in your country?
Do you think the way people travel today is different compared to the past? How?
What are some advantages and disadvantages of shopping online?
